title: Democracy: the role of dissent
brief_description: A democracy has legal channels for the redress of grievances. If these seem to fail, are other actions justified? A group of tenants are faced with this question as they demonstrate and consider a rent strike in protest against the living conditions in their apartment building.
description: A democracy has legal channels for the redress of grievances. If these seem to fail, are other actions justified? A group of tenants are faced with this question as they demonstrate and consider a rent strike in protest against the living conditions in their apartment building.
